title: UH-60 Black Hawk: Sound System + Flight Model
description: The UH-60 Black Hawk Sound System is an easily customizable flight model and about 65 sounds, including engine, rotors and weapon effects for cockpit, exterior and distant views with implemented replication. Ideal for AAA multiplayer shooters.
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO

The UH-60 Black Hawk Sound System - Crafted in C++ and Blueprints, meticulously controlled flight model for Sikorsky UH-60 Black Hawk helicopter with the most realistic helicopter sound, just like in real life.


  • Easily customizable helicopter flight model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, yaw and other helicopter's parameters
  • Weapon sounds from the weapons used by this helicopter in real life
  • Different sounds for cockpit, exterior, and distant views
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication for movement and sounds
  • Ideal for AAA multiplayer shooter games


This plugin offers an easily configurable flight model and the authentic soundscape meticulously crafted from real-world audio recordings, capturing every detail from the distinct hum of the engines to the thunderous roar of the rotors. Whether you're experiencing the perspective from the cockpit, the distant observer, or the external observer, the dynamic sound effects adapt seamlessly to reflect the changing parameters of the flight model, including engine RPM, airspeed, rotor thrust, and more.


But that's not all – delve deeper into the immersive experience with the recreated audio profiles of the UH-60's primary weapon systems. Feel the adrenaline rush as you engage targets with the iconic M134 minigun, unleash a hail of Hydra 70 rockets, or unleash devastating firepower with the AGM-114 Hellfire missiles.


Designed for seamless integration into multiplayer AAA projects, our plugin features replication of all sounds and flight model, ensuring a cohesive and immersive experience for all players. Elevate your project to new heights with the 'UH-60 Black Hawk: Sound System + Flight Model' plugin and experience the thrill of helicopter flight like never before.
technicalDetails:
Code Module: UH60_SoundSystem (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 7

Number of C++ Classes: 7

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


UH-60 BLACK HAWK HELICOPTER SOUND SYSTEM DEMONSTRATION: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE AND FLIGHT MODEL: VIDEO

  • Enable "UH60_SoundSystem " from Installed and "Windows RawInput" from Built-In plugins from "Edit > Plugins".
  • Set up the audio settings of your project as described in the 'How to Use' video.
  • Restart UE5.
  • Open "DemoLevel" from the plugin content folder.
  • FLY!!!


Check UH60_FlightModel_BP and UH60_SFX_Component_BP Actor Components in the UH60_Helicopter_BP to adjust Flight Model and Sound settings.


You can find all plugin content in Content Browser. Make sure the checkboxes Bottom right of the "Content Browser > View Options > Show Engine Content" and "Content Browser > View Options > Show Plugin Content" are checked.
